Token.Abstract: Delegates of a PTDBean object should implement this protocol. See BeanXcodeWorkspace for more examples.
Send when a generic Bean related errors occurs. This is usually called when invalid parameters are passed to Bean methods.

Parameter.Name: bean
Parameter.Abstract: The bean that caused or is related to the error.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Refer to BeanErrors for the list of error codes

Token.Abstract: Sent in response when a Bean's ArduinoPowerState has been requested.

Parameter.Name: bean
Parameter.Abstract: The Bean whose ArduinoPowerState has been requested.

Token.Abstract: Sent when a Bean has finished programming it's Arduino. The programming process was successful when error is nil.

Parameter.Name: bean
Parameter.Abstract: The Bean whose Arduino has been programmed.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Nil if successful, or an NSError if the programming was unsuccessful. See BeanErrors.

Token.Abstract: Time remaining until the Arduino is finished programming, and percentage of the process is complete.

Parameter.Name: bean
Parameter.Abstract: The Bean being programmed

Parameter.Name: seconds
Parameter.Abstract: The remaining number of seconds in the programming process

Parameter.Name: percentageComplete
Parameter.Abstract: The completion percentage of the programming process, from 0.0 to 1.0.

Token.Abstract: Serial data received from a Bean

Parameter.Name: bean
Parameter.Abstract: The Bean we're receiving serial data from

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: The data received from the Bean

Token.Abstract: Sent in response when a Bean's LED values are requested

Parameter.Name: bean
Parameter.Abstract: The Bean whose LED color has been requested

Parameter.Name: color
Parameter.Abstract: The Bean's LED color. Alpha channel is always 1.

Token.Abstract: Sent in response when a Bean's accelerometer readings are requested

Parameter.Name: bean
Parameter.Abstract: the Bean being queried

Parameter.Name: acceleration

Token.Abstract: Sent in response when a Bean's RSSI is requested

Parameter.Name: bean
Parameter.Abstract: The Bean whose RSSI data has been requested.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Nil if successful, or an NSError if the reading was unsuccessful. See BeanErrors.

Token.Abstract: Sent in response when a Bean's temperature is requested

Parameter.Name: bean
Parameter.Abstract: The Bean whose temperature data has been requested.

Parameter.Name: degrees_celsius
Parameter.Abstract: The ambient temperature in degrees Celsius

Token.Abstract: Sent in response when a Bean's battery or power supply voltage is requested

Parameter.Name: bean
Parameter.Abstract: The Bean whose battery or power supply voltage has been requested

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Nil if successful, or an NSError if the reading was unsuccessful. See BeanErrors.

Token.Abstract: Sent in response when a Bean's PTDBeanRadioConfig is requested.

Parameter.Name: bean
Parameter.Abstract: The Bean whose PTDBeanRadioConfig has been requested

Parameter.Name: config
Parameter.Abstract: The radio configuration of the bean, see PTDBeanRadioConfig for more details.

Token.Abstract: Sent in response when a Bean's scratch bank data is requested.

Parameter.Name: bean
Parameter.Abstract: The Bean whose scratch bank data has been requested.

Parameter.Name: bank
Parameter.Abstract: The index of the scratch bank to store data, from 1 to 5.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: Data to be stored in the selected bank. Can be up to 20 bytes.

Token.Abstract: This method is deprecated. Use [PTDBeanDelegate bean:didUpdateScratchBank:data:] instead. (Deprecated: v0.3.2)
Sent in response when information about a Bean's Arduino sketch is requested

Parameter.Name: bean
Parameter.Abstract: The Bean whose sketch info has been requested.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the currently programmed sketch

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: The date the sketch was programmed

Parameter.Name: crc
Parameter.Abstract: The CRC32 of the programmed sketch
